title: Prohibits the use of a cellular or wireless telephone while operating a motor vehicle except in specified circumstances; repealer
summary: Prohibits the use of a cellular or wireless telephone while operating a motor vehicle except for the sole purpose of obtaining emergency assistance under certain circumstances as specified herein; provides for civil fines for violations of such provisions.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to prohibiting a driver from using a cellular telephone while operating a motor vehicle; and to repeal section 1225-c of such law relating thereto
